channel.title: Anyone have invisibilty and invincibility command?
channel.description: if you do could you post it here? thanks! dont really know who the commands would work

item.title: Anyone have invisibilty and invincibility command?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

In your case 73 try this:

if (plz.ultimate == true){ hitDiff = 0; sendMessage("The other player is invinsible!"); }
Then add in your commands

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("invisibility") && playerRights > 1) { ultimate = true; }
Also add anywhere public boolean ultimate = false;
Tell me if that works or not lol I made it in the quick post box

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone have invisibilty and invincibility command?

item.title: Anyone have invisibilty and invincibility command?
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

hide:

if (command.startsWith("hide")) { sendMessage("Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command."); pHead=-100; pBeard=-100; pTorso=-100; pArms=-100; pHands=-100; pLegs=-100; pFeet=-100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("show")) { sendMessage("Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command."); pHead=3; pBeard=19; pTorso=19; pArms=29; pHands=35; pLegs=39; pFeet=44; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

rep pls want 15 rep so i can rep other

Read full topic
